fullplot: "Raja 1918", also known as "The Border", is a Finnish war drama film directed by Lauri Tèrhènen set in the immediate aftermath of the Finnish Civil War of 1918. It is spring of 1918. A young scientist and officer, captain von Munck (Martin Bahne), is sent to the village of Rajajoki to close the border between the newly independent Finland and Russia under Bolshevik revolution.
